001
002import java.awt.Color;
003import java.awt.Font;
004import java.awt.Graphics2D;
005import java.awt.image.BufferedImage;
006import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
007import java.io.File;
008import javax.imageio.ImageIO;
009
010/**
011 * tracker mapper applet
012 *
013 * @author matecsaba
014 */
015public class trackMap {
016
017/**
018 * this is needed for cli startup
019 *
020 * @param args command line parameters
021 */
022public static void main(String[] args) {
023  trackMap app = new trackMap();
024  String a;
025  try {
026    ByteArrayOutputStream buf = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
027    a = "" + app.getClass();
028    a = app.httpRequest("http://localhost/" + a, "./" + a, "cli", "clibrowser", "user", args, buf);
029    a = "type=" + a + "\r\ndata:\r\n" + buf.toString();
030  } catch (Exception e) {
031    a = "exception " + e.getMessage();
032  }
033  System.out.println(a);
034}
035
036/**
037 * do one request
038 *
039 * @param url url of app
040 * @param path path of app
041 * @param peer client address
042 * @param agent user agent
043 * @param user auth data
044 * @param par parameters
045 * @param buf result buffer, if empty, pathname must present
046 * @return [pathname"][file name.]extension
047 * @throws Exception if something went wrong
048 */
049public String httpRequest(String url, String path, String peer, String agent, String user, String[] par, ByteArrayOutputStream buf) throws Exception {
050  try {
051    int i = path.lastIndexOf("/");
052    path = path.substring(0, i + 1);
053    String s = par[0];
054    i = s.lastIndexOf("=");
055    s = s.substring(0, i);
056    BufferedImage img = ImageIO.read(new File(path + s));
057    for (int o = 1; o < par.length; o++) {
058      s = par[o];
059      i = s.lastIndexOf("=");
060      s = s.substring(0, i);
061      i = s.lastIndexOf("-");
062      boolean up = s.substring(i + 1, s.length()).equals("up");
063      s = s.substring(0, i);
064      i = s.lastIndexOf("-");
065      int y = Integer.parseInt(s.substring(i + 1, s.length()));
066      s = s.substring(0, i);
067      i = s.lastIndexOf("-");
068      int x = Integer.parseInt(s.substring(i + 1, s.length()));
069      s = s.substring(0, i);
070      Graphics2D g2d = img.createGraphics();
071      g2d.setBackground(Color.gray);
072      g2d.setFont(new Font("Serif", Font.BOLD, 20));
073      g2d.setPaint(Color.black);
074      g2d.drawString(s, x - 1, y - 1);
075      g2d.drawString(s, x - 1, y);
076      g2d.drawString(s, x - 1, y + 1);
077      g2d.drawString(s, x, y - 1);
078      g2d.drawString(s, x, y + 1);
079      g2d.drawString(s, x + 1, y - 1);
080      g2d.drawString(s, x + 1, y);
081      g2d.drawString(s, x + 1, y + 1);
082      g2d.setPaint(up ? Color.green : Color.red);
083      g2d.drawString(s, x, y);
084      g2d.dispose();
085    }
086    ImageIO.write(img, "png", buf);
087    return "png";
088  } catch (Exception e) {
089    buf.write("...exception happened...".getBytes());
090    return "txt";
091  }
092}
093
094}
